items.sentence: I\'ve been given permission to inspect this equipment.
I\'ve been trying to get in touch with you for months.
Tom didn\'t seem to understand the project\'s purpose.
No matter what I did, no one paid any attention to me.
I don\'t think that anyone suspected you weren\'t Tom.
Tom doesn\'t know how long the party is going to last.
Tom doesn\'t know how to speak French as well as I do.
Tom\'s father never came back home before nine or ten.
Tom\'s house is just about three kilometers from here.
Who knows what might happen a few years down the line?
